definition: abbr. for 心肌梗塞[xin1 ji1 geng3 sai1], myocardial infarction/heart attack
branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario

sentences.english: Most cases of ventricular fibrillation are linked to some form of heart disease. Ventricular fibrillation is frequently triggered by a heart attack.
sentences.chinese: 室顫通常是由心臟疾病引起的，比如心梗。

sentences.english: Doctor after acute heart stem treatment, the condition is stable, on the abdomen play hurts vanishing .
sentences.chinese: 醫生按急性心梗治療後，病情穩定，上腹劇疼消失。

sentences.english: When blood vessels became completely blocked, heart attacks and strokes occurred.
sentences.chinese: 當血管被完全堵塞後，就會發生心梗或者腦梗。

sentences.english: This review focuses on mechanisms of stem cells transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 本文就幹細胞移植治療心梗的機制作一綜述。

sentences.english: Objective To study the humanistic concern for the influence of patients with acute myocardial infarction rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討人文關懷對急性心梗患者康復的影響。

definition: sudden death (in medicine, sporting competitions etc)
